title: DELTARUNE Chapter 3 Complete Guide - Chapter Maps, Boss Battles & Easter Eggs
description: Complete DELTARUNE Chapter 3 walkthrough guide featuring detailed chapter maps, all boss battle strategies, and hidden easter egg locations to help you perfectly complete Chapter 3 of DELTARUNE.
keywords: DELTARUNE Chapter 3, walkthrough, chapter maps, boss battles, easter eggs, Chapter 3, completion guide, DELTARUNE guide

hero.title: DELTARUNE CHAPTER 3
hero.subtitle: Complete Strategy Guide - Chapter Maps ¬∑ Boss Battles ¬∑ Easter Eggs

overview.title: Chapter Overview
overview.description: DELTARUNE Chapter 3 was released on June 5, 2025, as part of the paid content package. This chapter brings a completely new Dark World experience, where you explore unknown territories with Susie, Ralsei, and Noelle. Chapter 3 of DELTARUNE features richer content, including more character development and complex puzzles that make this DELTARUNE chapter truly memorable.

peaceful.title: üïäÔ∏è Peaceful Route
peaceful.description: Complete DELTARUNE Chapter 3 without defeating any major enemies through violence. Use ACT commands and peaceful resolutions to progress through the TV World storyline.

aggressive.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Aggressive Route
